Welcome to Rome

Rome, the Eternal City, is a living museum of history, art, and culture. From ancient ruins to Renaissance masterpieces, Rome is a destination where the past meets the present.

Top Attractions in Rome

♥

Colosseum

An ancient amphitheater that hosted gladiatorial contests and public spectacles.

♥

Roman Forum

The heart of ancient Rome, showcasing ruins of temples, basilicas, and public spaces.

♥

Vatican City

The spiritual center of the Catholic Church, home to St. Peter's Basilica and the Sistine Chapel.

♥

Trevi Fountain

A Baroque masterpiece and iconic fountain where visitors toss coins to ensure a return to Rome.

♥

Pantheon

An ancient temple known for its massive dome and architectural brilliance.

♥

Piazza Navona

A lively square adorned with fountains, restaurants, and street performers.

♥

Castel Sant'Angelo

A historic fortress originally built as a mausoleum for Emperor Hadrian.

♥

Spanish Steps

A monumental staircase offering stunning views and access to Trinit√† dei Monti church.
